amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds made available by this Act to be used for the Climate Change Adaptation Task Force of the Department of Homeland Security.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds made available by this Act to be used for the Climate Change Adaptation Task Force of the Department of Homeland Security.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Carter amendment (A030) Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 180 (Roll no. 392).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Carter amendment (A030) Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 180 (Roll no. 392).
